message.content:
cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CC, cs.LG, cs.CY

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of computational approaches to model creativity, which falls under the scope of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The research was conducted at the Computational Linguistics Research Group, indicating a focus on natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of Python programming language suggests a focus on computer science theory and programming (cs.CC). The paper also discusses learning and evaluating the novelty and usefulness of creative ideas, which falls under the scope of machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper explores creativity in an artistic context, which could potentially fall under the scope of computer graphics (cs.CY).
